## FINAL PROJECT

```{r Setup}
# Libraries
library(readxl)
library(dplyr)
library(moments)
library(stringr)
library(scales)
library(ggplot2)
library(jsonlite)
library(utils)
library(rgdal)

# Functions
getMode = function(aColumn){
  freqTable=table(aColumn)
  maxFrequency=max(freqTable)
  names(freqTable[freqTable==maxFrequency])
}
```

```{r Import Data: Initial}
# Initial data set from 2_15_13
temp = tempfile(fileext = '.xlsx')
dataURL <- "https://github.com/lrsulli/GovAnalytics/raw/master/Data/fp_survey_2_15_13.xlsx"
download.file(dataURL, destfile = temp, mode = 'wb')

data_initial = read_excel(temp, sheet = 1)
head(data_initial,4)
```

```{r Import Data: Recodes}
# Recode file for Q12 and Q22 to Q25
temp = tempfile(fileext = '.xlsx')
dataURL <- "https://github.com/lrsulli/GovAnalytics/raw/master/Data/recode_Q12_Q22toQ25.xlsx"
download.file(dataURL, destfile = temp, mode = 'wb')

data_recode = read_excel(temp, sheet = 1)
head(data_recode,4)
```

```{r Import Data: Addresses}
# Address list data file
temp = tempfile(fileext = '.xlsx')
dataURL <- "https://github.com/lrsulli/GovAnalytics/raw/master/Data/address_list_5_20_13.xlsx"
download.file(dataURL, destfile = temp, mode = 'wb')

data_address = read_excel(temp, sheet = 1)
head(data_address,4)
```

```{r Merge Data: Recodes}
# Prepare recode file
names(data_recode)
data_recode = data_recode[,c(1,5:6,14:15,19:20)]
names(data_recode)[1] <- "STUDYID"
head(data_recode,4)

# Merge recode file with initial data set
data = merge(data_initial, data_recode, by="STUDYID")
```

```{r Merge Data: Addresses}
# Prepare address list file
names(data_address)[1] <- "STUDYID"
head(data_address,4)

# Merge address list
data = merge(data, data_address, by="STUDYID")

data = data.frame(data)
```

```{r Check Variable Names}
names(data)
```

```{r Rename Variables}

# Rename types of meal programs
names(data)[17] <- "meals"
names(data)[18] <- "hot_meals"
names(data)[19] <- "home_meals" #Home delivered meals
names(data)[20] <- "community_kitchen"
names(data)[21] <- "child_meals"
names(data)[22] <- "meal_other"

# Rename types of grocery programs
names(data)[24] <- "groceries"
names(data)[25] <- "pantry"
names(data)[26] <- "backpack"
names(data)[27] <- "home_groceries" #Home delivered groceries
names(data)[28] <- "mobile_pantry"
names(data)[29] <- "mobile_market"
names(data)[30] <- "supply_other" #Supply food to other programs
names(data)[31] <- "community_garden"
names(data)[32] <- "groceries_other"

# Rename types of food related benefit programs
names(data)[34] <- "food_ben" #Offers food-related benefits
names(data)[35] <- "snap"
names(data)[36] <- "wic"
names(data)[37] <- "school" #School lunch or breakfast
names(data)[38] <- "git" #Gift car or voucher
names(data)[39] <- "food_ben_other"

# Rename types of non-food related benefit programs
names(data)[56] <- "nonfood_ben" #Offers non-food related benefits
names(data)[57] <- "job" #Job training or assistance
names(data)[58] <- "house" #Housing assistance
names(data)[59] <- "utility"
names(data)[60] <- "legal"
names(data)[61] <- "educ" #GED or education assistance
names(data)[62] <- "health"
names(data)[63] <- "counseling"
names(data)[64] <- "trans" #Transportation assistance
names(data)[65] <- "cloth" #Clothing or furniture
names(data)[66] <- "ref" #Referrals to other programs
names(data)[67] <- "medicaid" #Medicaid or CHIP
names(data)[68] <- "money" #Financial, tax prep, budgeting
names(data)[69] <- "nonfood_ben_other"

# Rename number of clients served per month
names(data)[187] <- "clients"
```

### EXPLORING DICHOTOMOUS DATA

#### Meal Programs

```{r Meals: Distribution}
# Distribution of values
table(data$meals)
```

```{r Meals: Frequencies}
# Relative Frequencies
prop.table(table(data$meals))
```

```{r Meals: Chi Square}
# Are the difference significant?
distribution = table(data$meals)
chisq.test(distribution)
```

```{r Meals: Central Measure}
# Central measurement and dispersion
getMode(data$meals)
```
